original: 衛溫無法佔領並統治夷州，更未到達亶州，且兵士折損者眾，消耗的人力物力不計其數，孫權以違詔無功的罪名，將兩人處斬。
text: Wei Wen was unable to occupy and rule Yizhou, nor did he reach Bozhou. Moreover, many soldiers were damaged, and countless manpower and material resources were consumed. Sun Quan executed the two on the charge of violating the imperial court.
